pages.text: Say goodbye to the days of throwing items in lava or cacti to destroy them, this modus will deal with that!$(br)Captchalogue an item to store it, and click it to delete all copies in your inventory!$(br)If the sylladex is full, items will be straight-up deleted. This also applies to items already in your sylladex.
Combine any modus card and a Lava Bucket in a Totem Lathe.
